Smokescreen/Manterror/Injector/Double Punch:



Double Punch cursed himself for not moving after he fired that missile.  
Moving to the side, the beam nearly hit him.  Cloaked, he raised a currently 
invisible pincher, firing a signature-seeking missile off at Cyber Claw's 
right knee.

---

Manterror raised an arm as a beam hit him in the chest, cursing loudly as the 
pain was near unbarable, he fired an ion disk off at Cyber Claw.

---

Injector fired two stinger missiles off at Cyber Claw, cursing as a beam 
nearly hit him.
